system.description:
You can initiate a Spell Duel as the Challenger without spending MP using a Weapon you’re wielding, provided the Caster or a target is within your Weapon’s range or you’re in a Space between them. When you do, you make a Martial Check instead of a Spell Check.

You can also spend 1 or more SP to gain a +1 bonus on your Check per SP spent (you can still spend MP as normal to gain +2 on your Check per MP spent). You have ADV on your Check if you are within 1 Space of the Caster.

eSqw39wQihuKdOsC.name: Trigger Spell Duel
